example_message.title: message title
example_message.message: message body, can use react-markdown syntax
example_message.link: link to url opened when clicking the news card (optional)

img.ref: premade images in the ui assets folder
img.url: use this for custom images that are not in the news folder

3.0_beta.title: ARENA 3.0 WEEKEND PLAYTEST
3.0_beta.message:
Experience the new 3.0 update until Monday.  
Join our discord <u>discord.gg/fivemarena</u>

koth_ad.title: KING OF THE HILL
koth_ad.message: Try out the **new** King of the Hill gamemode.

aimtraining_ad.title: AIM TRAINING
aimtraining_ad.message:
Try out the new **Aim Training** gamemodes
Vehicles, Gridshot, Tracking and Shooting Range

hopouts_ad.title: HOPOUTS
hopouts_ad.message:
Try out the new **Hopouts** gamemode
3 teams of 20, **gang peds**, rotating maps!

voip_disabled.title: VOIP DISABLED
voip_disabled.message: We are investigating an issue with VOIP causing server timeouts. During this time we have disabled VOIP, more updates soon.

gungame_100wins.title: Military Shovel
gungame_100wins.message: The first 5 players to reach 100 Gun Game wins will unlock the legendary **Military Shovel** skin
